text: Not sure how far reaching this is but there is a bit of scandal right now regarding a top finance journal. The retiring managing editor made public a list of every reviewer over the past 3 decades, how many papers they reviewed (including how many they rejected), and their average turnaround time. Naturally, this made many people very upset!
